mapper.insert: insert into drama (rank, title, platform, type, character, expl, eps, rate) values (#{rank} , #{title} , #{platform} , #{type}, #{character}, #{expl}, #{eps}, #{rate})
mapper.update: update drama set rank=#{rank}, title=#{title}, platform=#{platform}, type=#{type}, character=#{character}, expl=#{expl}, eps=#{eps}, rate=#{rate} where seq=#{seq}
mapper.select: select * from drama order by seq desc
